name: Childish Dream
description: The dream is not meaningless, it is not absurd, in the dream it is not assumed that one part of our set of ideas is hidden or dormant and the other part is obvious and awake. Dreaming is a completely valid psychological phenomenon; In fact, the dream is a preparation for the realization of a dream. Dreams can be considered as a continuous part of perceived mental activities in the waking state; The dream arises through an extremely complex mental action. In my opinion, the simplest dreams can be seen among children.
